Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan while we address a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan while we address a mechanical problem on a train.

  • Shuttle buses are available between Belmont and Howard to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

  • #22 Clark
  • #36 Broadway
  • #151 Sheridan

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
